International Human Rights Law International human rights law is the body of law that protects human rights. acceptedAnswer.text: The LL.M. in International Trade and Economic Law at Amity University covers a wide range of subjects, including: International Trade Law International Economic Law WTO Law International Investment Law International Environmental Law International Intellectual Property Law International Commercial Law International Business Law International Arbitration Law International Human Rights Law The program also includes a research component, in which students are required to write a dissertation on a topic of their choice. Here are some additional details about the subjects covered under the LL.M. in International Trade and Economic Law at Amity University: International Trade Law International trade law is the body of law that governs international trade. It includes rules and regulations that govern the movement of goods, services, and capital across borders. International Economic Law International economic law is the body of law that governs the international economy. It includes rules and regulations that govern the trade of goods and services, the movement of capital, and the investment of foreign direct investment. WTO Law The World Trade Organization (WTO) is an international organization that sets rules for international trade. The WTO has 164 member countries, and its rules are binding on all member countries. International Investment Law International investment law is the body of law that governs foreign direct investment. It includes rules and regulations that protect foreign investors from unfair treatment by host governments. International Environmental Law International environmental law is the body of law that protects the environment. It includes rules and regulations that govern the pollution of air, water, and land, and the protection of endangered species. International Intellectual Property Law International intellectual property law is the body of law that protects intellectual property. It includes rules and regulations that govern copyrights, trademarks, patents, and other forms of intellectual property. International Commercial Law International commercial law is the body of law that governs commercial transactions between businesses in different countries. It includes rules and regulations that govern contracts, sales, and other forms of commercial transactions. International Business Law International business law is the body of law that governs the activities of businesses in the international arena. It includes rules and regulations that govern trade, investment, and other forms of business activity. International Arbitration Law International arbitration law is the body of law that governs arbitration between parties from different countries. Arbitration is a process in which parties agree to have their dispute resolved by a neutral third party. International Human Rights Law International human rights law is the body of law that protects human rights. It includes rules and regulations that protect the right to life, liberty, and security of person, the right to freedom of speech, the right to freedom of religion, and other fundamental human rights.
